summary: This MOD will give you a look similar to a lioness. It is a replacement for Khajiit female. Mod includes new textures and a new head.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Hello, here is set of textures and head mesh for Lioness look. As a basis, I used Sabrelion textures from MOD Yiffy Age of Skyrim by Bad Dog.  Head mesh is by NightroModzz, further edits for use in the game made by Blaze69.  Blaze69 also helped me and fixed the visible seams on textures.

 [/size][size=4] [/size][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Textures and head mesh works as a replacement instead of female Khajiit. [/b]

[/size][/color][size=4] [/size][size=4]A short tail is not included, it does not work well, have bad UV mapping.[/size][size=4] 


[/size][size=4]Now available for UNB and CBBE body [img]https://www.loverslab.com/resources/emoticons/default_wink.png[/img]  (CBBE version is a bit different)

[/size][size=5]Installation :[/size] [size=4]Possible is only manual installation.[/size][size=6] [/size][size=4]Extract the files, move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim).[/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=4][size=5]I'll be glad, if you send here some screenshots of your character  [/size][/size][/color][/b][img]https://www.loverslab.com/resources/emoticons/default_biggrin.png[/img]
[size=4] [/size][size=4] 

[/size][size=4]Credits: 

[/size][size=4][color=#e69138]Thanks to [/color][color=#f4f4f4][b]Bad Dog[/b][/color][color=#e69138] for use of his textures as basis[/color]

[/size][size=4][color=#e69138]Thanks to [/color][b]KrittaKitty[/b][color=#e69138] for souce textures[/color]

[/size][size=4][color=#e69138]Thanks to [/color][b]Blaze69[/b][color=#e69138] for further edits [/color]

[/size][size=4][color=#e69138]Thanks to [/color][b]NightroModzz[/b][color=#e69138] for amazing head mesh[/color][/size][size=4] [/size][size=4] 



[/size][size=4]PS. I am sorry for my bad English[/size]
author: poblivion
